product_name: Volkl Charisma Skis with Bindings - Women's - Closeout
long_description: A frontside ripper able to tackle soft snow on a whim, Charisma skis with bindings sport a rockered tip and lightweight wood core, providing advanced skiers with nimble, all-mountain capability.
short_description: A frontside ripper able to tackle soft snow on a whim, Charisma skis with bindings sport a rockered tip and lightweight wood core, providing advanced skiers with nimble, all-mountain capability.
